main event: A witness observed a small round white object like a star in Las Vegas, Nevada, which appeared suddenly, hovered for a short time, and then disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as round and white, resembling a star., The witness could not determine the size, distance, or nature of the object., The sighting was reported to have occurred on June 22, 1967., Two other UFOs were spotted by the same witness within two hours., The report came from Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force UFO investigation program.
witness description: A 17-year-old male who observed the object and reported the sighting.
